name: Baby Pokemon #172: Pichu
text:
Once per turn, you can add 1 "Baby Pokemon" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Baby Pokemon #172: Pichu" once per turn, and this card cannot attack the turn this effect is activated. If this card is attacked, Flip a coin: If tails, negate the attack.

Concept by MauGamesLOL
